name: Death Star Prison Break
description:
In this mashup of Zelda, Gameboy, Wolfenstein 3D, and Star Wars, you take on the role of Leia Organa, who's been thrown in the brig of the Death Star. Grab a blaster, princess, because the Falcon's not coming. It's up to you to fight your way to the surface and escape.

If you're playing on a phone or tablet, use the onscreen controls. If you're playing on a keyboard, here are some shortcuts:

  • MOVE - WASD or Arrows
  • SHOOT - X or K or SPACE
  • STRAFE - Z or L or SHIFT

On each level, find the MAP to see where you are. Find the COMPASS to see where you need to go to reach the next elevator. Good luck!

This game requires WebGL. It works best in Chrome or Firefox, but honestly it hasn't been tested very well. If it doesn't work for you, please leave a comment telling me what kind of hardware and browser you're using. Thanks! :D

This is my first itch.io game jam submission. Jam link here: https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam

-Scott
